name: Ghost of Viridia
description:
Description

The Viridian Brotherhood once followed a noble cause: 

To purge evil.

To punish the corrupt.

To protect the citizens of Viridia.

But soon, the very same atrocities the brotherhood swore to fight against grew like an infection in their ranks.

And now they must be exterminated...
